name: LD42 - Reverse
description:
How to be both full and out of space.

A cooperative game between you and yourself. Keep the balance and solve these 20 puzzles in a Zen atmosphere.

Controls:
- Black Square: X C V (QWERTY users: A W D or A S D) (AZERTY users: Q S D or Q Z D)  
- White Square: LEFT UP/DOWN RIGHT

Can be played alone or with a friend!
